name: gather-your-party-with-svelte
description: Workshop to learn Svelte by creating your own character creator!

scripts.solve: find ./src -name '*.SOLUTION.svelte' -exec bash -c 'mv $0 ${0/SOLUTION./}' {} ; && find ./src/routes -name 'SOLUTION.*.svelte' -exec bash -c 'mv $0 ${0/SOLUTION./}' {} ; && find ./src/routes -type d -name '*.SOLUTION' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0"/* ${0/.SOLUTION/}/' {} ;
scripts.ci:solve: find ./src -name '*.SOLUTION.svelte' -exec bash -c 'mv $0 ${0/SOLUTION./}' {} \; && find ./src/routes -name 'SOLUTION.*.svelte' -exec bash -c 'mv $0 ${0/SOLUTION./}' {} \; && find ./src/routes -type d -name '*.SOLUTION' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0"/* ${0/.SOLUTION/}/' {} \;
scripts.ci:build: npm run ci:solve && npm run build
scripts.deploy: cp -R . /tmp/gypws-deploy && cd /tmp/gypws-deploy && npm run solve && vercel --prod && rm -rf /tmp/gypws-deploy
